con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="Recaudo" targetNamespace="http://www.javeriana.com.co/services/Recaudo/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:dat="http://www.javeriana.com.co/services/Recaudo/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd3="http://javeriana.co/ents/common/BaseExtensions/V1.0" xmlns:xsd2="http://javeriana.co/ents/common/BaseMessageFormat/V1" xmlns:xsd4="http://www.javeriana.com.co/recaudos"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.javeriana.com.co/recaudos/"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.javeriana.com.co/recaudos" schemaLocation="Recaudo_RealizarPago.xsd"></xsd:import> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://javeriana.co/ents/common/BaseMessageFormat/V1" schemaLocation="Pragma-common-BaseMessageFormat-V1.xsd"></xsd:import> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="requestHeaderMsg"> <wsdl:part element="xsd2:requestHeaderOut" name="requestHeader"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="responseHeaderMsg"> <wsdl:part element="xsd2:responseHeaderOut" name="responseHeader"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="realizarRecaudoRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="xsd4:realizarRecaudo"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="realizarRecaudoResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="xsd4:respuestaRealizarRecaudo"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="exceptionList"> <wsdl:part name="error" element="xsd2:exceptionList"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="Recaudo"> <wsdl:operation name="realizarRecaudo"> <wsdl:input message="dat:realizarRecaudoRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="dat:realizarRecaudoResponse"/> <wsdl:fault name="error" message="dat:exceptionList"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="RecaudoSOAP" type="dat:Recaudo"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="realizarRecaudo"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.javeriana.com.co/Recaudo/realizarRecaudo"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="dat:requestHeaderMsg" part="requestHeader" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:header message="dat:responseHeaderMsg" part="responseHeader" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="error"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="error"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="Recaudo"> <wsdl:port binding="dat:RecaudoSOAP" name="RecaudoSOAP"> <soap:address location="http://www.example.org/"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.javeriana.com.co/recaudos" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.javeriana.com.co/recaudos"> <element name="realizarRecaudo" type="tns:RealizarRecaudo"/> <complexType name="RealizarRecaudo"> <sequence> <element name="idCliente" type="tns:usuario" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="numeroConvenio" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="referenciaFactura" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="valorApagar" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="usuario"> <sequence> <element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="tipo" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="numero" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="respuestaRealizarRecaudo" type="tns:RespuestaRealizarRecaudo"/> <complexType name="RespuestaRealizarRecaudo"> <sequence> <element name="codigoRespuesta" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="descripcionRespuesta" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="referenciaFactura" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://javeriana.co/ents/common/BaseMessageFormat/V1" version="1.0" xmlns:bons1="http://javeriana.co/ents/common/BaseExtensions/V1.0" xmlns:tns="http://javeriana.co/ents/common/BaseMessageFormat/V1" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://javeriana.co/ents/common/BaseExtensions/V1.0" schemaLocation="Pragma-common-BaseExtension-V1.xsd"></xsd:import> <xsd:element name="requestHeaderIn" type="tns:RequestHeaderIn"/> <xsd:element name="requestHeaderOut" type="tns:RequestHeaderOut"/> <xsd:element name="responseHeaderOut" type="tns:ResponseHeaderOut"/> <xsd:element name="responseHeaderIn" type="tns:ResponseHeaderIn"/> <xsd:complexType abstract="true" name="Header"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="systemId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="messageId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="invokerDateTime" type="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RequestHeaderIn"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:Header"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="securityCredential" type="bons1:SecurityCredential"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="destination" type="bons1:Destination"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="classification" type="bons1:Classifications"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="messageContext" type="bons1:MessageContext"></xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="routingStack" type="bons1:RoutingStack"></xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="componentNameLogging" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RequestHeaderOut"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:Header"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="securityCredential" type="bons1:SecurityCredential"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="destination" type="bons1:Destination"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="classification" type="bons1:Classifications"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseHeaderOut"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:Header"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="responseStatus" type="bons1:ResponseStatus"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="destination" type="bons1:Destination"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseHeaderIn"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:Header"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="responseStatus" type="bons1:ResponseStatus"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="destination" type="bons1:Destination"></xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="messageContext" type="bons1:MessageContext"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="routingStack" type="bons1:RoutingStack"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="exceptionList" type="bons1:ExceptionList"/> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://javeriana.co/ents/common/BaseExtensions/V1.0" version="1.0" xmlns:tns="http://javeriana.co/ents/common/BaseExtensions/V1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>V.1.0 Fecha creaci√≥n [ 2012-06-15 ] Fecha caducidad [ AAAA-MM-DD ] Autor(es) [ gabriel.morris@pragma.co, julian.garzon@pragma.co]</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType name="Property"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="key" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MessageContext"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="property" type="tns:Property"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SystemException"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="faultcode" type="xsd:QName"/> <xsd:element name="faultstring" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="faultactor" type="xsd:anyURI"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="detail" type="xsd:string"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseStatus"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element default="SUCCESS" minOccurs="1" name="statusCode"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PROVIDEREXCEPTION"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TECHNICALEXCEPTION"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BUSINESSEXCEPTION"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SecurityCredential"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="userName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="userToken" type="xsd:anyType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="Destination"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="namespace" type="xsd:anyURI"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="operation" type="xsd:string"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="Classifications"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="classification" type="xsd:anyURI"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BaseException"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="code" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="LoggingData"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="sourceSystemId" type="xsd:string"></xsd:element> <xsd:element default="ESB" minOccurs="1" name="destinationSystemId" type="xsd:string"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EndPoint"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="address" type="xsd:anyURI"></xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="correlationId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="messageId" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RouteData"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="CallBackTo" type="tns:EndPoint"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RoutingStack"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="routeTo" type="tns:RouteData"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RequestBody"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="request" type="xsd:anyType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseBody"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="response" type="xsd:anyType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="exceptionList" type="tns:ExceptionList"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ExceptionList"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="exception" type="tns:BaseException"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
